name: Roll The Ruins
description:
^^^ WEBGL Builld is currently broken download link ^^^

An evil bunny?! Don’t be fooled by their cuteness, they are out there to get you. Your objective is to defeat as many bunnies as you can without dying. You defeat them by rolling dice. Your dice determines how much damage you inflict on the bunny. 1 the least, 6 the most.

You can also navigate the dungeon with WASD and warp to a new dungeon by pressing R.

Art - https://fantasyrose.itch.io/

Programming - https://tayotwo.itch.io/
